title: Goa CM Pramod Sawant allocates portfolios, keeps Home and Finance - DNA India
content: Goa CM Pramod Sawant allocates portfolios, keeps Home and Finance  DNA India
description: Goa CM Pramod Sawant allocates portfolios, keeps Home and Finance - The Goa Chief Minister will hold the charge of Home, Finance, Personnel, Vigilance, and Official Languages departments in the state.
